column5: Looking for someone who's used this outfitter. Specifically, if anyone has been to My Lake and could give me some info. would be great. Walleye fishing is our main interest. One of these posts is going to produce something :-)

I have been to several of Peters out posts as well as the main camp at Roderick Lake. Always had good walleye and northern fishing on his lakes. Been to keeper river,culverson,keeper and Marvin lake alway with good results. Personally like marvin the best.
